h2_title: How to Complete the Snox Fox Mission
content: When you've beaten Non-Void, return to the fox guai near the Forest of Felicity Keeper's Shrine. Examine the body and the spirit of the fox can finally be free. By completing the mission, you'll earn the Snow Fox Brush Curio.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'How to Complete the Snox Fox Mission'.
The content is as follows:
When you've beaten Non-Void, return to the fox guai near the Forest of Felicity Keeper's Shrine. Examine the body and the spirit of the fox can finally be free. By completing the mission, you'll earn the Snow Fox Brush Curio.
